main_definition: to be composed or made up of certain elements, parts, or components.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make up in terms of composition or content; to include as constituents.
meanings_and_examples.example: The soup consists of carrots, onions, and potatoes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be comprised or constituted by certain elements in a particular way.
meanings_and_examples.example: Our team consists of five members: two developers, one designer, and two testers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have as components; to contain specified things within oneself.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her personality consists of kindness, intelligence, and a great sense of humor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be made up of specific ingredients or materials.
meanings_and_examples.example: A pizza consist of dough, sauce, cheese, and various toppings like pepperoni or mushrooms.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To represent something as being a particular thing; to be represented by certain elements.
meanings_and_examples.example: The book consists of three parts: introduction, body, and conclusion.
